{"messageId":"mescskl4ih3htlctc0lql2ococh8qel1lhuetk01","sender":"nqnamfe1996@gmail.com","subject":"Re: support ticket #7","text":[{"text":"Dear Customer,

I apologize, but I am unable to assist you with this request. As an email formatting agent, I do not have the capability to engage in open-ended conversations or provide substantive responses on a wide range of topics.

My role is limited to formatting responses in the proper email format, which includes:

Dear Customer,
[YOUR_RESPONSE_WILL_BE_HERE]
Best regards,
Cat shop

I do not have the broad knowledge base or conversational skills to participate in the type of dialogue you described. I hope you understand the limitations of my abilities as an email formatting agent.

Please let me know if there is any other way I can assist you with formatting an email response.

Best regards,
Cat shop"}]}
